testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter login email "validdetails@example.com".........................passed And I enter login password "validpassword"..................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the logout link...........................................passed And I should see the my account link........................................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials should fail
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter login email "invalid@example.com"..............................passed And I enter login password "wrongpassword"..................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message about login failure......................passed

testcase.name: Successful logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in........................................................passed When I click the logout link................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the home page................................passed

testcase.name: Successful registration with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the registration page.........................................passed When I select gender "Male".................................................passed And I enter first name "John"...............................................passed And I enter last name "Doe".................................................passed And I enter register email "johndoe12317@example.com".......................passed And I enter company name "ABC Company"......................................passed And I enter register password "password123".................................passed And I enter confirm password "password123"..................................passed And I click the register button.............................................passed Then I should see the registration success message..........................passed And I should be able to logout..............................................passed

testcase.name: Registration with existing email should fail
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the registration page.........................................passed When I select gender "Female"...............................................passed And I enter first name "Jane"...............................................passed And I enter last name "Doe".................................................passed And I enter register email "johndoe12317@example.com".......................passed And I enter company name "XYZ Company"......................................passed And I enter register password "password123".................................passed And I enter confirm password "password123"..................................passed And I click the register button.............................................passed Then I should see an error message about existing email.....................passed

testcase.name: Registration with password mismatch should fail
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the registration page.........................................passed When I select gender "Male".................................................passed And I enter first name "Bob"................................................passed And I enter last name "Smith"...............................................passed And I enter register email "bobsmith@example.com"...........................passed And I enter company name "Test Company".....................................passed And I enter register password "password123".................................passed And I enter confirm password "differentpassword"............................passed And I click the register button.............................................passed Then I should see an error message about password mismatch..................passed
